Part of the final exam for an organic chemistry lab course was to follow a synthetic procedure to get a product. They did it in pairs. So a couple of students got to prepare acetylsalicylic acid (aspirin). At the end they were supposed to get crystals, but instead they were left with some wierd yellow oil with no chance to crystallize. They were sure they had failed the test. Until one of them remembered he had a pack of aspirin pills in his bag. Bingo! They quickly crushed them, extracted with chloroform and recrystallized to get really nice crystals. So the prof came and examined the product. He asked them many questions about the procedure, reaction conditions etc. At the end he scratched his head and said: "You know, every year we get this wierd yellow oil, but you guys were the first to get crystals!"

How to extract DMT: a step-by-step guide

*Please spread this information as far and wide as possible; everybody deserves to know.*

*Materials:*

\- 100g powdered mimosa hostilis, acacia confusa, or acacia acuminata root bark

\- 100ml 5% acetic acid (distilled white vinegar)

\- 200ml nonpolar solvent (naphtha VM&P OR xylene)

\- 1800ml distilled water

\- 120g sodium hydroxide (lye)

\- 140g sodium chloride (deiodized salt)

\- Large glass pipette (with small tip)

\- Milligram scale (to weigh product)

\- Flat-top scale (to weigh bark)

\- 4000ml glass mason jar

\- 500ml glass beaker

\- Glass bowl/dish (to freeze precipitate)

\- Glass vial (to store product)

\- Spash-proof goggles

\- Lab coat OR long-sleeve attire

\- Latex/rubber gloves

\- Respirator OR dust mask

*Procedure:*

1. Add 140g sodium chloride and 400ml distilled water to 500ml beaker to create a saturated saline solution (heat bath as necessary)

2. Place 100g powdered MHRB in mason jar

3. Add 1000ml distilled water and 100ml distilled white vinegar to mason jar

4. Stir every 5 minutes for 30 minutes

5. Soak for 30 minutes

6. Decant 400ml of saturated saline solution to mason jar

7. Add 120g sodium hydroxide and 400ml distilled water to 500ml beaker to create a basified solution

8. Decant 400ml of basified solution to mason jar

9. Stir every 5 minutes for 30 minutes

10. Soak for 30 minutes

11. Add 100ml nonpolar solvent

12. Stir every 15 minutes for 1 hour

13. Let layers separate for 24 hours

14. Use pipette to siphon the top layer (nonpolar solvent) into glass bowl/dish

15. Freeze at -18C (0F) for 24 hours until crystallization is finished

16. Pour excess solvent back into mason jar (add 50ml solvent as necessary)

17. Turn dish upside down and let crystals dry for 24 hours

18. Scape up crystals and place into glass vial, repeat steps 14-18 (3x)

19. Clean all glassware and properly dispose of leftover chemicals

20. Vaporize and inhale crystals to explore the inner workings of the universe

*Safety Information:*

* Always assume all chemicals are toxic
* Use acetic acid to neutralize all sodium hydroxide spills
* Extinguish any flames prior to beginning the procedure
* If any chemicals come into contact with skin, neutralize and rinse skin with water
* Fume hood or outbound-facing fan recommended
* Do not consume product alongside lithium or tramadol
* Consuming product may cause cosmic epiphanys

*Good luck. <3*

A little something from eMedicine Emergency:



The symptoms of lidocaine toxicity tend to follow a predictable progression. The toxicity begins with numbness of the tongue, lightheadedness, and visual disturbances and progresses to muscle twitching, unconsciousness, and seizures, then coma, respiratory arrest, and cardiovascular depression.

CNS toxicity: When the lidocaine dose is increased from 1 mg/kg to 1.5 mg/kg, the risk of CNS toxicity increases from 10% to 80%. Symptoms include the following:

o Lightheadedness, dizziness
o Visual disturbance
o Headache
o Perioral tingling, numbness or tingling of tongue
o Sedation
o Impaired concentration
o Dysarthria
o Tinnitus
o Metallic taste
o Muscular twitching, tremors

With progression of toxicity, the patient may experience tonic-clonic seizures and, eventually, unconsciousness and coma. Seizures generally do not occur with lidocaine levels of less than 10 mcg/mL.
Cardiovascular: Excessive lidocaine concentration can cause cardiovascular toxicity, although this is less common than CNS toxicity. Lidocaine is somewhat less cardiotoxic than lipophilic local anesthetics  such as bupivacaine. Risk of cardiac toxicity is greatest in those patients with underlying cardiac conduction problems or after myocardial infarction.

Potential cardiovascular effects include the following:
Negative inotropic effects

Effects on vascular tone (with low doses having vasoconstrictive effects and higher doses causing relaxation of vascular smooth muscle)
Effects on cardiac conduction include widened PR interval, widened QRS duration, sinus tachycardia sinus arrest, and partial or complete atrioventricular dissociation.
Cardiac arrest has been reported after intraurethral administration of lidocaine.

Cardiac toxicity is potentiated by acidosis, hypercapnia, and hypoxia, which worsen cardiac suppression and increase the chance of arrhythmia.

This is important to consider since seizure makes this metabolic picture more likely.
Plasma lidocaine levels of less than 5 mcg/mL are unlikely to have cardiovascular toxicities. Levels of 5-10 mcg/mL can cause hypotension by inducing both cardiac suppression and vascular smooth muscle relaxation. Levels of more than 30 mcg/mL are associated with cardiovascular collapse.

CNS symptoms may be masked in patients premedicated with anticonvulsants such as benzodiazepines or barbiturates. The first sign of toxicity in these premedicated patients may be cardiovascular system (CVS) depression.

When blood levels are high enough to block inhibitory and excitatory pathways, convulsions cease and the patient experiences respiratory depression or arrest and cardiovascular depression.
Large bolus injections may increase peak anesthetic levels to the point where the CNS and CVS are simultaneously affected.

Diäten werden hauptsächlich aus zwei Gründen angewendet:

erstens zur Gewichtsab- oder -zunahme, zweitens zur Behandlung von Krankheiten.










Ephedrin ist ein Sympathomimetikum von
schwächerer, jedoch länger anhaltender Wirkung als Adrenalin. Es wirkt
blutdrucksteigernd, herzstimulierend, bronchienerweiternd und
appetithemmend, weshalb es in Arzneimitteln gegen Hypotonie,chronische
Bronchitis, Asthmaanfälle und zur Abschwellung der Schleimhäute bei
Schnupfen sowie als Bestandteil von Appetitzüglern Verwendung
findet.Dieser Online steroide Shop ist der einzige Shop, welcher seine
Ware sicher und kostenfrei aus Europa versendet.

Ephedrin ist dafür bekannt, dass es die Körpertemperatur erhöht und somit mehr
Kalorien verbrannt werden. Dieser Fettverbrennungseeffekt kann durch die
zusätzliche Gabe von Coffein und Acetylsalicylsäure noch verstärkt
werden Zudem besitzt Ephedrin eine Adrenalin ausschüttende Wirkung,
wodurch die Körperkraft und Ausdauer enorm zunimmt.

If my chemistry teachers had been even 1/10th as inspiring as your videos, I would have been much more interested in chemistry. I got As and learned everything they taught me, but never really cared about the possibilities. The worst chemistry teacher I had would just come in, write the text word-for-word from the textbook on the whiteboard as he spoke it, then he would call it a day. I remember labs where we collected data, messed something up, then did some creative math to work backwards to get to the desired result. I also remember splashing some pretty strong acid on my shirt and being embarrassed, I hid it and completed the lab while my shirt slowly dissolved. Those were the good old days!

Hey, I couldn't find your patreon in the video description nor on your chanel. :)

That beeing said; please don't take this personally but I think your Method is rather unprofessional:
I'm sure that you are aware, that Chemicals that are "not" soluble in a certain solution will actually dissolve just in a lower concentration. Therefor it is always neccessary to determine the exact solubility of every component. And whether or not advanced cleaning steps are neccesary. Even trace-amounts could act as a substrate or catalyst for reactions that you did not consider. Thus you could easily end up with a completely different product, which could be dangerous or at least ruin future synthesis etc.

I'm aware that this is just a mild introduction but i still want to provide some quality control for your chanel :) I really hope you don't mind.
